alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 27 at 12:51PM MDT until March 30 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Most of southeast New Mexico and the mountains and adjacent plains of West Texas. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County
